REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A f1743 reute r f BC-S&L-ACQUISITION-RAISE 03-16 0077

TEXT.TITLE: FAILING WASHINGTON STATE S/L IS ACQUIRED
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Home Loan Bank Board (FHLBB) announced the acquisition of Home Savings and Loan Association in Seattle, Washington, by InterWest Savings Bank of Oak Harbour, Washington. The FHLBB said Home Savings was the 12th troubled savings institution requiring federal action this year. It said Home Savings had assets of 150.6 mln dlrs in assets and InterWest had assets of 342.9 mln dlrs. Reuter
